flavor_text: Each soul he devours adds its hunger to his own.

name: Barbarian Riftcutter
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes."
—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

name: Blockbuster
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: Blockbuster deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.
flavor_text: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.

name: Breath of Fury
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control

When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

name: Char
oracle_text: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

name: Cleansing Beam
oracle_text: Radiance — Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
flavor_text:
"Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty."
—Razia

name: Coalhauler Swine
oracle_text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
flavor_text: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

name: Dogpile
oracle_text: Dogpile deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.
flavor_text: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

name: Excruciator
oracle_text: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.
flavor_text:
"Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study."
—Simic research notes

name: Fiery Conclusion
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Fiery Conclusion, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

name: Flame Fusillade
oracle_text: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
flavor_text:
"A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now that's military efficiency."
—Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant

name: Flash Conscription
oracle_text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast Flash Conscription, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.

name: Frenzied Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

name: Galvanic Arc
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Galvanic Arc enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Enchanted creature has first strike.

name: Goblin Fire Fiend
oracle_text: Haste
Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Goblin Spelunkers
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

name: Greater Forgeling
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

name: Hammerfist Giant
oracle_text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
flavor_text:
"Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit."
—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

name: Hunted Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, haste
When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.
flavor_text: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Incite Hysteria
oracle_text: Radiance — Until end of turn, target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain "This creature can't block."
flavor_text:
"The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

name: Indentured Oaf
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.
flavor_text: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

name: Instill Furor
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature unless it attacked this turn."
flavor_text:
"The Rakdos know little of technology, but they definitely know how to push buttons."
—Trivaz, Izzet mage

name: Mindmoil
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text:
"My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

name: Molten Sentry
oracle_text: As Molten Sentry enters the battlefield, flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 5/2 creature with haste. If it comes up tails, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 2/5 creature with defender.
flavor_text: Some take after their father, Stone, some after their mother, Fire.

name: Ordruun Commando
oracle_text: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
flavor_text: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

name: Rain of Embers
oracle_text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

name: Reroute
oracle_text: Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
oracle_text: Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.
flavor_text: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

name: Seismic Spike
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all of the time.

name: Sell-Sword Brute
oracle_text: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

name: Smash
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

name: Sparkmage Apprentice
oracle_text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.

name: Stoneshaker Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
flavor_text: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

name: Surge of Zeal
oracle_text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry."
—Savra

name: Torpid Moloch
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.
flavor_text: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

name: Viashino Fangtail
oracle_text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger."
—Simic research notes

name: Viashino Slasher
oracle_text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

name: Warp World
oracle_text: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library.

name: War-Torch Goblin
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: War-Torch Goblin deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other."
—Agrus Kos

name: Wojek Embermage
oracle_text: Radiance — {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
flavor_text: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

name: Bramble Elemental
oracle_text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

name: Carven Caryatid
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

name: Chord of Calling
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Civic Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

name: Doubling Season
oracle_text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

name: Dowsing Shaman
oracle_text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

name: Dryad's Caress
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast Dryad's Caress, untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape."
—Rogad, Selesnya initiate

name: Elves of Deep Shadow
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

name: Elvish Skysweeper
oracle_text: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.

name: Farseek
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

name: Fists of Ironwood
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Enchanted creature has trample.
flavor_text: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll.

Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly six cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Goliath Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: The glittering strands of its complex web catch everything from a buzzing gnat to a passing bloatdrake.

name: Greater Mossdog
oracle_text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
flavor_text: Man's best fungus.

name: Hunted Troll
oracle_text: When Hunted Troll enters the battlefield, target opponent creates four 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying.
{G}: Regenerate Hunted Troll.

name: Ivy Dancer
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Her ivy locks are a remnant of the wooded wilds now lost to Ravnica forever.

name: Life from the Loam
oracle_text: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.

Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Moldervine Cloak
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Nullmage Shepherd
oracle_text: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The shepherds work in secret, seeking out abominations against nature and returning them to earth and dust.

name: Overwhelm
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Let the song of Selesnya be heard above the rhythm of our thundering hordes!"

name: Perilous Forays
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"This is the place? This map has got to be wrong . . . ."
—Svania Trul, wayfinder novice, last words

name: Primordial Sage
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: For each creature that arrives in its audience, the sage imparts another piece of ancient wisdom for all to hear.

name: Recollect
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"The bones of the past will tell their tales—if you know how to speak their language."
—Savra

name: Rolling Spoil
oracle_text: Destroy target land. If {B} was spent to cast Rolling Spoil, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shadow that fell over the grove was silent yet horribly alive, roiling with millions of tiny minions dedicated to the process of rot.

name: Root-Kin Ally
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Root-Kin Ally gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Scatter the Seeds
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

name: Scion of the Wild
oracle_text: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

name: Siege Wurm
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
flavor_text: The Rubblefield was once among the wealthiest districts in Ravnica. All it took was a single wurm to reduce it to ruins.

name: Stone-Seeder Hierophant
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant.
{T}: Untap target land.
flavor_text: Her touch brings to bare stone what water and sun bring to rich soil.

name: Sundering Vitae
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

name: Transluminant
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: "Forget yourself. Forget your city. Forget your homes, your families, the debts and obligations that hold you to this world."

name: Trophy Hunter
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Trophy Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
Whenever a creature with flying dealt damage by Trophy Hunter this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Trophy Hunter.

name: Ursapine
oracle_text: {G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A friendly ursapine means a constant supply of sharp spears. An unfriendly one means a constant supply of small holes.

name: Vinelasher Kudzu
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.
flavor_text: It grows to hate you.

name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
oracle_text: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

name: Autochthon Wurm
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample
flavor_text: The trainer awoke to begin the journey from the wurm's tail to its head. The sun was setting when she arrived.

name: Bloodbond March
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, each player returns all cards with the same name as that spell from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: The Golgari support a vast army because death never ends its soldiers' service.

name: Boros Swiftblade
oracle_text: Double strike
flavor_text: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

name: Brightflame
oracle_text: Radiance — Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text:
"Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way."
—Razia

name: Chorus of the Conclave
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay any amount of mana. If you do, that creature enters the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: "We are many, yet one. We are separate in body, yet speak with a single voice. Join us in our chorus."

name: Circu, Dimir Lobotomist
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target library.
Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target library.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as a card exiled with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

name: Clutch of the Undercity
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 3 life.

Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Congregation at Dawn
oracle_text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and reveal them. Shuffle your library, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
flavor_text: "It is fitting that we meet in the first hour of light, for we are called by the Conclave to pierce a threat of darkness."

name: Consult the Necrosages
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player draws two cards.
• Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Dimir rank and file never see nor hear their guildmaster. All orders are given through mysterious necrosages who appear from the shadows, tersely toss out a command, and then melt into the darkness.

name: Dark Heart of the Wood
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Forest: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The soil here is rich with the rotting dead, and the sun's fingers barely penetrate the dark canopy. Plant our brethren here. This shall be our sanctuary."
—Savra

name: Dimir Cutpurse
oracle_text: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
flavor_text: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

name: Dimir Doppelganger
oracle_text: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card and gains this ability.
flavor_text: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."

name: Dimir Infiltrator
oracle_text: Dimir Infiltrator can't be blocked.

Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Drooling Groodion
oracle_text: {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations ‘growth.'"
—Veszka, Selesnya evangel

name: Firemane Angel
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
{6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Flame-Kin Zealot
oracle_text: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

name: Glare of Subdual
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.
flavor_text: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
oracle_text: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir."
—Szadek

name: Golgari Germination
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

name: Golgari Rotwurm
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

name: Grave-Shell Scarab
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Grave-Shell Scarab: Draw a card.

name: Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi

Vigilance
flavor_text: It stands sentinel to the great City-Tree, home of the Selesnya Conclave.

name: Lightning Helix
oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

name: Loxodon Hierarch
oracle_text: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
{G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.
flavor_text: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

name: Mindleech Mass
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Mindleech Mass deals combat damage to a player, you may look at that player's hand. If you do, you may cast a nonland card in it without paying that card's mana cost.

name: Moroii

flavor_text:
"Touched by moroii"
—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

name: Perplex
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller discards his or her hand.

name: Phytohydra
oracle_text: If damage would be dealt to Phytohydra, put that many +1/+1 counters on it instead.
flavor_text:
"Look at this creature, so like the Conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes."
—Veszka, Selesnya evangel

name: Pollenbright Wings
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

name: Psychic Drain

flavor_text:
"Gold can be reearned, goods restored. The moroii steal youth, more precious than either, and once gone, it's gone forever."
—Berta Suszat, civic healer

name: Putrefy
